item.title: Best of Humble Bundle: The Witcher + Cyberpunk by Dark Horse
item.content:encoded: Looking for awesome stories set in two of the most exciting universes around? This bundle of The Witcher and Cyberpunk 2077 books and comics from Dark Horse has the goods for stone cold monster hunters and chromed-out netrunners alike! The Witcher Volume 1: House of Glass sends Geralt on one of most harrowing adventures yet, replete with human drama and haunting terror in equal measures. Cyberpunk 2077: Your Voice is full of dazzling action and corpo intrigueâ€”the hallmarks of a killer Night City tale. Youâ€™ll also get deep looks into these awesome universes with books like The World of Cyberpunk 2077 and The World of the Witcher, and much more! Pay what you want for this action-packed bundle and help support SpecialEffect with your purchase!

item.title: Pianos, Music, and More for Dummies
item.content:encoded: Inherited a piano from a long-lost relative but have no idea how to play? Determined to make sense of all that sheet music you have lying around? Got a song in your heart but no way to write it down? This bundle of music instruction books from the team at For Dummies will have you tickling the ivories and composing your symphony in no time! Start simple with some easy piano exercises, get into the weeds a little with music theory, learn the ancient arts of composition, songwriting, and vinyl collecting, or start living that record mogul life with a crash course in music business! Anything a beginner musician or music enthusiast could need is right here, so get these books while you can at the price of your choice, and support Music Willâ€™s efforts to get music education to students in need with your purchase!

item.title: SPRINGFLING 2026 Physical Tabletop RPG Core Book Bundle
item.content:encoded:
Make some space on your bookshelves, because weâ€™ve got a very special book bundle for all the TTRPG enthusiasts out there: a library of physical copies of roleplaying game rulebooks to kick off your next tabletop adventure! Hunt down replicants and have an existential crisis or two in Blade Runner The Roleplaying Game! Save the Mortal Realms from the evil Nagash in Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soulbound! Master the arts of elemental bending and unite the Four Nations in Avatar Legends: The Roleplaying Game! Grab this collection of roleplaying tomes while you can, and support the ACLU with every purchase at the price of your choice!

Limited Quantities Available! In the US Only.

Keys expire, redeem before March 31st, 2026. Items ship from the Magpie Games Store after March 1st.

item.title: Quilting and Embroidery by C & T Publishing

item.title: Knit Happens! Knitting for Creative Knitter Critters by Abrams Books
item.content:encoded: Already got the knack for knitting but unsure where to take your skills? Ready to pick up a new hobby in the new year and already planning out ambitious projects? Get started on your knitting projects today with this ebook bundle available for the price of your choosing, and support indie bookstore and comic shop charity organization BINC with your purchase!
